message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $950000.  This is a fair price considering its value to both of us.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I really think that's the highest I can go.

Bob, I understand your position. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $850000 is still significantly below what I need to make this deal work. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go any lower than $900000. This is a fair compromise, and it allows us both to walk away happy.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $900000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $880000, but that's as high as I can go.
